system.descriptor: Picking Pockets, palming small objects, performing tricks, and other stealthy acts made without the notice of others.
system.uses: Uses: If vs a target is an Opposed Test vs opponent's Awareness or Scruinty. Examples include Attempting to Steal Something from a target's pocket or on their person. Palming evidence from the scene of a crime. Performing an action unseen to a person who knows where you are.
system.useTime: Half Action, or Free Action but has -10
